meta.title: Vert.x Blueprint Tutorials
meta.summary: The Vert.x Blueprint project aims to provide guidelines to Vert.x users to implement various applications such as message-based applications and microservices.

meta.title: Centralized logging for Vert.x applications using the ELK stack
meta.summary: This post entry describes a solution to achieve centralized logging of Vert.x applications using the ELK stack (Logstash, Elasticsearch, and Kibana).

meta.title: Vert.x fall conferences
meta.summary: A lot of Vert.x conferences are planned this fall around the world, here is a quick recap of these events.

meta.title: Building services and APIs with AMQP 1.0
meta.summary: Microservices and APIs are everywhere. Everyone talks about them, presentation slides are full of them ... some people are actually even building them.

meta.title: Vert.x Web API Service Introduction
meta.summary: This blog post teaches you how to use the new module vertx-web-api-service to combine the Web Router and the OpenAPI Router Factory with service proxies.

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.
